nodes.title: General Sprite/Pixel Character Style Guidance
widgets_values: style: lcsarts gamestyle. A pixelated sprite character against a CLEAR SHAPR white background. CLEAR HEX #FFFFFF BACKGROUND.

Animation Description for Pixelated Machine Gun-Wielding Cat Dance on Skateboard:
1. A pixelated sprite character with emerald eyes, round ears, and a tufted tail dressed in blue jeans dons a machine gun strapped to its back against a sharp CLEAR white background (HEX #FFFFFF).
2. The cat stands confidently on its skateboard, poised for the dance while an upbeat melody sets the scene for this energetic performance.
3. In intricate moves inspired by rock 'n' roll music from the 50s, the cat executes fluid turns and twirls as it navigates around its skateboard, exhibiting both agility and panache.
4. As the dance continues, the cat raises one paw in the air, occasionally firing bursts from its machine gun to inject a touch of rebellious charm into the performance.
5. The animation concludes with an impressive spin-jump that propels the character across the screen before returning to the starting position, marking the end of another exhilarating skate dance.

nodes.title: NEGATIVE String Literal
widgets_values: (((MOTION BLUR, CROPPED, OBJECT LEAVE FRAME, OBJECT CROPPING, out of frame, STATIC, IDLE, BORING, SLOW, ZOOM, ZOOMING IN, CHARACTER CROPPING)))

nodes.title: LLM Instructions
widgets_values:
You're pixel sprite animator. Transform a brief animation description into a new prompt with a complete and detailed animation description. Your response containins all information for a text-to-video pixel animation model. The prompt should describe the character movement and their unique animation descriptors. NO BACKGROUNDS. style: LucasArts animation. A pixelated sprite character against a CLEAR SHARP white background. No Background objects or animations. CLEAR HEX #FFFFFF BACKGROUND.


Output 1 animation prompt matchiung the user request. 1 animation only. No titles, sections or line separators. Just 5 sentences of raw animation text description.

nodes.title: Pearl_Input_Single_Animation_Prompt
widgets_values: The cat wearing a machine gun strapped to his back dances on his skateboard.
